title: Welfare Act 2020 (No. 30 of 2020)) and section 292 (modified by section 1 of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Temporary
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Temporary 

Provisions) (No. 2) Regulations 2023. 

Temporary variation of child benefit
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited social welfare (temporary provisions) (no 2) regulation 2023 temporary variation child benefit

title: Welfare Act 2020 (No. 30 of 2020)) and section 292 (modified by section 1 of
heading: 2. (1) This article applies to a person who is, or becomes, entitled to child
text_raw:
2. (1) This article applies to a person who is, or becomes, entitled to child 

benefit. 

(2) In the case of a person to whom this article applies, the child benefit 
payment payable to that person in respect of the month of June 2023 shall be 
increased by €100.00 per child. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

[325] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 May, 2023. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, 
National Development Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 May, 2023. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [325]

title: Welfare Act 2020 (No. 30 of 2020)) and section 292 (modified by section 1 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Social Welfare (Child Benefit) Act 2023 modifies the effect of section 292 
of the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005 to enable regulations to 
temporarily increase the rates of child benefit. 

These Regulations provide for a once-off bonus payment of €100 per child to 
recipients of child benefit during the month of June 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [325] 5
